resources.string: Password must be at least 6 characters

XXYYZZ, with the following rules:

XX the first two letters of the first name of your mother.
YY ist the day of your birthday
ZZ are the first two letters of the streetname your are living in
What do you want to use your phone for?
Click here to answer this question immediately.
Did you do more than your intention?
I feel regret for part of my phone use.
I had a strong sense of agency.
I have lost track of time while using my phone.
I had a good sense of my surroundings while using my phone.
Which pair of emotion corresponds best to how you felt this usage session?
Please give us access to the following permissions as this application needs them to collect your usage data.
Please enable the accessibility service for Rabbit Hole Tracker!

By enabling the accessibility service for this applications, we will be able to track your screen events. 

Please go in the settings to the Downloaded Services section and enable Accessibility Service for the Rabbit Hole Tracker application. 

Then come back to this application.

Enable notification permissions, so we can collect the timestamps about your received notifications. 

Please select the Rabbit Hole Tracker application in the settings and enable the notification listener. 

Then come back to this application.

Give this app permission to access your usage statistics, so we can collect your usage events. 

Please select the Rabbit Hole Tracker application in the settings and enable usage information access. 

Then come back to this application.
Give Permission to show our app on the lock screen
Please allow this application RabbitHoleTracker to show our questionnaire on your lockscreen.
Please fill out the first questionnaire under the following link or by clicking on the notification. \n\nAfter your are finished, come back to this application.

Please try to answer the prompted questionnaires always as truthfully as possible. 

This application will collect your usage data in the background. Be aware that it might affect the battery drain and internet usage of your phone. 

Make sure than you have internet access as much as possible.

If you notice that the app is not running, for example after a phone restart, just open the application again to restart logging.
TrackingApp is collecting your usage data.
If you have any questions about this study or run into technical problems with this application, please contact:
Please make sure that the you see the logging notification of this app at any time and that you receive our short questionnaires. \n\nIf not, open this application again to restart it.

Your two weeks of study are over, but feel free to continue to use the application for longer if you want to help us out a little bit more. \n\nPlease fill out the second questionnaire under the following link, if not already done:

- Demography
- Smartphone accelerometer sensor data
- Smartphone gyroscope sensor data
- Smartphone rotation sensor data
- Smartphone proximity sensor data
- Light intensity
- Smartphone accessibility events
- Activity recognition 
- Changes in airplane mode
- Changes in bluetooth connections
- Changes in ringer mode and sound level
- Changes in screen rotation
- Change in screen states
- Changes in battery levels
- Changes in internet connections
- Timestamps of phone calls
- Timestamps of SMS
- Timestamps and priority of notifications
- Internet addresses of visited websites
- Sent and received bytes
Your tracked usage data is saved anonymously.
Click here to answer this questionnaire.
